roleset.name: move lightly over the surface of
roleset.note: SKIM-V NOTES: I'm unsure what to do about 'John skimmed rocks on the millpond.' (from skim.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Galileo will skim past Earth in 1990 and 1992, *trace* collecting energy from the planet's gravitational field to gain momentum for its trip to Jupiter.
example.arg: *trace* collecting energy from the planet's gravitational field to gain momentum for its trip to Jupiter

roleset.name: remove from the very top
roleset.note: SKIM-V NOTES: Member of VNcls wipe_manner-10.4.1. (from skim.02-v)
SKIMMING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from skimming.02-n)

example.name: more good cookin'
example.text: John skimmed the grease from the bowl of soup Mary made for him.
example.arg: from the bowl of soup Mary made for him

roleset.name: remove from the very top, phrasal
roleset.note: SKIM_OFF-V NOTES: See VNcls wipe_manner-10.4.1. (from skim.03-v)

example.name: might not take source
example.text: Among unanswered questions are whether Mr. Papandreou received $23 million of stolen Bank of Crete funds and an additional $734,000 in bribes, as contended; whether the prime minister ordered [state agencies]-5 [*-5]to deposit some $57 million in Mr. Koskotas's bank and then skim off the interest; and, what PASOK's cut was from the $210 million Mr. Koskotas pinched.
